label: A2BC4_cP84_205_d_ac_2d-001
title: CaB$_{2}$O$_{4}$ (IV) Structure
comments: CaB$_{2}$O$_{4}$ exists in at least four phase (Marezio, 1969): \begin{itemize} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4_oP28_60_d_c_2d-001}{The ground state}, stable below 1.2 GPa, {\em Strukturbericht} $E3_{2}$ \item Orthorhombic high pressure structure, stable between 1.2 and 1.5 GPa, presumably \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4_oP56_56_2e_e_4e-001}{Calciborite} \item \href{current_web_home_dir/A2BC4_oP84_33_6a_3a_12a-001}{Orthorhombic high pressure structure}, stable between 1.5 and 2.5 GPa \item Cubic high pressure structure, stable between 2.5 and 4.0 GPa (this structure) \end{itemize}
